page.title: 03Tourism_Holiday Camp
page.content: {Accomodation.}Primrose valley camp has 196 chalets and 1004 caravans.All the caravans have hot and cold water,a shower,a cooker and a refrigerator. Three bedroomed caravans have one double,two single beds and two bunk beds.The 2 bedroomed caravans have 1 double beds and two single beds.For a week in Easter a caravan costs Â£75 to hire and Â£140 for a week in July or August.Visitors stay on the camp as long as they like. {Staff.}The reception to the camp has 7 members of staff who work 9 a.m. in the morning till 9 p.m. at night,7 days a week. The camp also has staffed 1 electrician,2 plumbers,2 joiners,16 side staff and 2 security guards who work 24 hours a day.
